OrgName: LexisNexis Legal & Professional, a division of Reed Elsevier Inc.
activities: LexisNexis Legal & Professional receives personal information from its CounselLink customers and their legal service providers in connection with providing enterprise legal management services to those customers.  When providing these services and related customer support activities, including technical support, LexisNexis Legal & Professional is receiving and processing the personal information under the direction of the customers.  LexisNexis Legal & Professional also receives and processes personal information pertaining to its CounselLink customers’ personnel to provide and improve its services, customer support and marketing activities.
corpofftitle1: General Counsel Intellectual Property, Privacy and Governance
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Off-line, on-line, manually processed CounselLink customer data
